name: Takeover (1ByteUniverse)
description:
The desert has been invaded by the People's Republic of Grote, and freedom is at an all time low. Possess foes and innocent bystanders in order to take down the government and free the people of the land.

Features:

- Innovative possession mechanic

- 5 epic levels

- Deadly foes

- Explosive barrels

- Land mines

- Banger soundtrack

NOTE: Aiming does not work properly when running the game in resolutions other than 1080p.

Game made with Godot for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 in one week.
